name: Baked Spaghetti I
author: LaDonna Reed
summary: Make this tasty dish ahead of time, and cook it when needed. Allow a little extra cooking time if you make this ahead and refrigerate.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add spaghetti, and cook for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente
In a large skillet over medium-high heat, saute the onions, green peppers and ground beef
Once beef is brown and onions and peppers softened, add the tomatoes, mushrooms and oregano
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place half of the cooked spaghetti into the prepared dish
Top with half of the meat mixture
Sprinkle with 1 cup of the mild Cheddar cheese
In a medium bowl, mix together cream of mushroom soup and water until smooth; pour over casserole
Bake in preheated oven for 30 to 35 minutes
